metadata.title: CVE-2017-12086 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the'BKE_mesh_calc_normals_tessface' functionality of the Blender open-source3d creation suite. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integeroverflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code executionunder the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user toopen a .blend file in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
